title: 求翻译！英语渣。最好能够全部翻译出来
author: Ks丶
txt_content:
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team - Base command for this plugin
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team create <name> - creates a team
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team disband - disbands the team
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team vault - opens the vault
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team invite - invites a player
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team kick - kicks a player form the team
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team tag <name> - changes the name of the team
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team leave - leaves your team
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team list - shows teams
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team who [team name] - shows the players online and the players offline
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team chat - Toggles chat mode
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team sethome - Sets the home of a team
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team home - Teleports to home
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team shop - Opens shop (Click here for more details)
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team ally - Allys a team
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team enemy - Enemies a team
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team neutral - Neutrals a team
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team relationship [team name] - Shows the list of allies and enemies of a team
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team rank <player> <rank> - Changes a rank of a player in your team when you are the leader.
[size=14.3999996185303px]Commands only for ops
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team setteammax <name> - sets the a limit of teams.
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team setmembermax <name> - sets the max members in a team.
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team invsee <team name> - shows the vault of a team (modifying is allowed)
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team editprice <index> <price> - edits the price of the shop (Click here for more details)
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team scp <amount> - Sets the price for creating a team!
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team scj <amount> - Sets the price for joining a team!
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team fdisband <team name> - Forcibly disbands another team!
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team addenabledworld - Adds the world you are standing on to the list of worlds
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team listenabledworlds - Lists all enabled worlds
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team deletenonexistingworlds - Removes all deleted worlds (when the world file is deleted) from the list
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team removeallworlds - Enables the plugin on ALL worlds
[size=14.3999996185303px]/team fdelhome <team name> - deletes a sethome of a specific team
[size=14.3999996185303px]

TeamPlugin组队插件、发布者没有完全翻译，你至少翻译邀请玩家 玩家如何接受吧？
@allan0327     

 另外求大神翻译一下  至少翻译出  接受邀请是那个指令 多谢大神
[size=14.3999996185303px]

[size=14.3999996185303px]
